pr_title: #3619 Subject Area OMAS to supply 'unique' qualifiedName on create

timeline.message:
#3619 Subject Area OMAS to supply 'unique' qualifiedName if not supplied on create

#3619 Remove blank line

Signed-off-by: David Radley <david_radley@uk.ibm.com>
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/odpi/egeria into git3619

timeline.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: And I prefer to use "@" instead of "."
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: @immmus I assume you are thinking of the Spring StringUtils, this module should not have a Spring dependancy, so I have followed your feedback but wrote out the tests without the utility.
replies.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText: @davidradl I am talking about apache commons StringUtils.
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText:
@davidradl I am talking about apache commons StringUtils.

@immmus Thanks for the clarification, I have coded it in a simple if, I think this should be sufficient for now.
replies.author: davidradl
